about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of multiplayer fun with our unique game where creativity meets humor. In this game, players write prompts, submit GIFs that match the prompts, and then vote for other players' GIFs. The twist? They use their phones as controllers, making the game a perfect party companion.

Our game is a blend of quick thinking, humor, and competition. Players are challenged to come up with the most fitting or hilarious GIFs in response to prompts, and the fun part is that the prompts are created by the players themselves. The game is all about creativity, laughter, and friendly competition.

Key Features:
  • Multiplayer: Play with friends.
  • Interactive: Use your phone as a controller.
  • Creative: Write your own prompts and choose GIFs that match.
  • Competitive: Vote for the best GIFs and aim for the top of the scoreboard.
  • Fun: Perfect for parties or casual gaming sessions.
  • Real-time: Everything happens in real-time, making the game dynamic and engaging.
